alert.note: Alert for Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 10:02AM CST until March 19 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Arkansas... White River At Des Arc affecting Prairie County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY, MARCH 19... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River At Des Arc. * WHEN...Until Saturday, March 19. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Many acres of farmland flooded within the levees. Water is backing up Bayou Des Arc and Cypress Bayou. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 24.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue to slowly fall to a stage near 24.3 feet by Sunday. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecast 12 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Crest Time Date White River Des Arc 24.0 24.5 Thu 9 AM 24.4 24.3 24.3 **Falling** &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
